text: Nadia is a female given name, mostly in the Russian and Ukrainian languages. The name means "hope". The name is very popular in Italy, Spain, France and Russia. One person named Nadia is Nadia Comăneci. Several fictional characters are named Nadia. This name was ranked #460 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == * Nadia Comăneci, Romanian gymnast and five-time Olympic gold medalist * Nadia Sharmeen, journalist from Bangladesh ==References== Category:Given names
title: Nadia
